subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The trainer Bob Baffert says he is “90 percent sure” that Lookin at Lucky will stay home to run in next weekend’s $750,000 Santa Anita Derby rather than the Arkansas Derby a week later.
snippet: The trainer Bob Baffert says he is “90 percent sure” that Lookin at Lucky will stay home to run in next weekend’s $750,000 Santa Anita Derby rather than the Arkansas Derby a week later.
